CustomField.description: Used to replace the rebate opp created? nodes (Buyout, Subsidy, Partner Referral( on the Opportunity Consolidated Process Builder
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( TEXT(Type) = 'Rebate', TEXT(Rebate_Type__c) = 'Buyout', NOT(ISBLANK(Returning_Opportunity__c)), ISBLANK(Returning_Opportunity__r.Buyout_Opportunity__c) ), 'Buyout', IF( AND( TEXT(Type) = 'Rebate', TEXT(Rebate_Type__c) = 'Subsidy', NOT(ISBLANK(Returning_Opportunity__c)), ISBLANK(Returning_Opportunity__r.Subsidy_Opportunity__c) ), 'Subsidy', IF( AND( TEXT(Type) = 'Rebate', TEXT(Rebate_Type__c) = 'Partner Referral', NOT(ISBLANK(Returning_Opportunity__c)), ISBLANK(Returning_Opportunity__r.Partner_Referral_Opportunity__c) ), 'Partner Referral', '' )))
CustomField.label: Rebate Type Formula
